2C652B4C.Line27.BC41C: So I led a scouting party into the old mage ruins. They’ve long been considered off limits, but ruins can hold treasures—as I see you know.

7C9B5719.VoiceDir27.BC41C: Heavy. Regretful. Honest. (Observes the Player's equipment on last bit.)

9270B1CA.Line25.BC41C: The dead awaited us inside. Alim and Tala fell, and... I gave the order to leave them.

F87C3848.Line23.BC41C: The Iron Wolves badly need equipment, gold... anything to sustain us.
